message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
You're getting a small share, but I'm willing to give you a chance to negotiate
You got a big chunk, now it's my turn to get more
A moderate split, but I'm still holding out for more
I'm getting closer to the majority, you're getting close to nothing
I'm making a strong comeback, don't underestimate me
You're getting desperate, I'm getting greedy
I'm not giving up yet, you're getting close to the limit
You're almost out of options, I'm taking the majority
I'm going all in, you're not taking the whole pot
You're really scraping the bottom of the barrel, I'm taking it all
I'm not going out without a fight, you're not getting everything
